code: import axios from"axios";export const commentApis={getAllComments:async params=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BE_URL,"comments"),{params:{...params,_sort:"creatAtComment",_order:"desc"}});return response;},addComment:async comment=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BE_URL,"comments"),comment);return response.data;},getCommentById:async id=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BE_URL,"comments/").concat(id));return response;},deleteCommentById:async id=>{return await axios.delete("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BE_URL,"comments/").concat(id));},editCommentById:async(id,commentUpdate)=>{const data=await axios.patch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BE_URL,"comments/").concat(id),commentUpdate);return data;}};
